thread.title: Great stay for a small hotel in the heart of Times Square

author: karentU1241XS
title: Great stay for a small hotel in the heart of Times Square
text:
We had a king size bed in a quite room. We stayed on the 5th floor and asked to be on the quiet side of the street because we had our 3 year old with us. The staff was very accommodating to that. King size bed was perfect and comfortable for the 3 of us who only stayed one night. Room was very clean. If you have children, a hotel with a pool is a must! We picked this hotel for that reason. The pool was small but just right for our toddler. I would go back there anytime because it was so close to Times Square and all the fun kid attractions in New York.
Room Tip: Ask for a quiet room if they are available. Street noise can be just that...noise! See more room tips
